Notes[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Template:Chief_guests_in_republic_day_parade&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: Notes")]

    1.**^** Danish Prime Minister attended Republic Day in Madras (Chennai).[53]
    2.**^** For the first time, the President of India ([S. Radhakrishnan](/wiki/Sarvepalli_Radhakrishnan "Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan")) could not take the salute at the Republic Day parade due to ill-health.[54] Zahir Shah arrived on 28 January.[55]
